name: speaches
description: Speaches is a self-hosted transcription and speech-to-text platform. It processes audio files or streams and provides text output, timestamps, and export options via a web interface.
features: Speech-to-text: Transcribes audio files into text with high accuracy.
Multiple languages: Supports transcription in dozens of languages.
Timestamp generation: Adds timestamps to transcripts for easy navigation.
Audio formats: Processes MP3, WAV, FLAC, and other common audio formats.
Batch processing: Transcribes multiple files simultaneously.
Speaker diarization: Identifies and labels different speakers in audio.
Punctuation: Automatically adds punctuation to transcribed text.
Export options: Downloads transcripts as TXT, SRT, or VTT formats.
Web interface: Uploads and manages transcription jobs through browser.
API access: Integrates transcription into other applications via REST API.
Privacy focused: Processes audio locally without sending to external services.
Model selection: Chooses between speed and accuracy with different AI models.
